content: requires a log in to download the free ebook 1 including all twelve zodiac animals **pattern description from *knit 1* fall/winter 2008 ** according to legend the twelve animals of the chinese zodiac cemented their stature by being the first to cross the finish line of a race presided over by buddha they represent the characteristics of each particular sign ana paula rimoli s playful stuffed toys all made with lion brand yarn s vanna s choice are single-crocheted in the round the snake s body differs as do the arms and legs of the snake and rooster otherwise the silhouettes for each are exactly the same with species-specific features of felt and embroidery **materials ** * aran weight yarn in assorted colors * 9 mm plastic eyes with safety backings * little pieces of craft felt * size g/6 4 mm crochet hook * black brown and pink embroidery floss * tapestry needle * fiberfill or stuffing of your choice **pages ** 22-23 **note ** the pattern for the main body parts was available in the magazine only the **free pdf** from knit 1 free extras gave instructions for making the tails ears muzzles horns and combs only the full pattern may now be downloaded at the vogue knitting website 2 the full pattern is for all 12 zodiac animals you will need to log in to download the free pattern sheep snake monkey rat horse dog ox pig rabbit rooster dragon tiger 1 http //www vogueknitting com/default aspx tabid=1255 2 http //www vogueknitting com/default aspx tabid=1255
